markdown.markdown:
This page is intended to serve as a catchall with general information for the lab.

* Resources for current members of the lab.
* Tips and tricks for coding and using github.
* Links to relevant information.
* Overview of the data pipeline and database.

june.name: Dr. June skeeter
june.education:
University of British Columbia, PhD
University of South Carolina, MSc
Salisbury University, BSc
june.bio: I am a non-binary geographer, researcher, and educator. I have been living and working on unceded Coast Salish Territory since 2015.  My research focuses on using micrometeorology, remote sensing, spatial analysis, and machine learning to understand ecosystem-scale energy, water, and carbon fluxes. I am particularly interested in understanding climate feedback mechanisms and studying how wetland restoration/preservation can be used to help fight climate change.
